GLBA_Requirement_Description: Develop implement and maintain a comprehensive information security program
Designate a qualified individual to oversee the information security program

SCF_Control_Name: Applicable Statutory Regulatory Contractual Requirements Definition
GLBA_Requirement_Description: Develop implement and maintain written policies and procedures
Identify reasonably foreseeable internal and external risks
Assess the sufficiency of existing policies procedures and safeguards
Design and implement safeguards to control identified risks
Report in writing to board or governing body at least annually
Conduct risk assessment to identify risks to customer information
Perform periodic risk assessments of customer information
Implement safeguards to control assessed risks
Adjust information security program based on test results and changes
Identify information systems storing customer information
Analyze dependencies of systems processing customer information
Maintain inventory of information systems with customer information
Monitor information systems that store customer information
Track location of systems processing customer information

SCF_Control_Name: Business Continuity and Disaster Recovery Program
GLBA_Requirement_Description: Implement incident response plan
Develop procedures to respond to security events
Test key controls and safeguards periodically
Maintain policies for secure change management
Oversee service provider arrangements
Ensure service providers maintain appropriate safeguards
Monitor and test effectiveness of safeguards
Regularly test or otherwise monitor key controls
Report compliance status to board or governing body
Implement access controls for customer information
Document secure system configurations
Implement continuous monitoring or periodic penetration testing
Monitor for unauthorized access to customer information
Detect security events affecting customer information
Implement encryption of customer information
Encrypt customer information at rest
Encrypt customer information in transit
Manage cryptographic keys securely
Implement secure key generation and rotation procedures
Classify customer information by sensitivity
Align safeguards to customer information classification
Identify locations of all customer information
Implement secure disposal of customer information
Securely dispose of media containing customer information
Secure endpoints accessing customer information
Apply baseline security configurations to endpoints
Implement malware detection and response capabilities
Train personnel on information security
Provide security awareness training to personnel
Limit access to customer information to authorized individuals
Implement authentication to validate user identity
Enforce access controls on customer information systems
Establish and maintain incident response plan
Document incident response procedures and responsibilities
Detect security incidents affecting customer information
Contain and recover from security incidents
Include notification procedures in incident response plan
Coordinate testing of safeguards
Plan and execute security assessments
Test effectiveness of safeguards and controls
Conduct periodic penetration testing
Control mobile device access to customer data
Enforce security controls on mobile devices
Secure networks transmitting customer information
Use firewalls to limit network access
Segment networks based on risk and data sensitivity
Limit physical access to systems with customer information
Control and log physical access to secure areas
Protect and securely dispose of physical media
Implement data minimization for customer information
Incorporate data minimization into system design
Assess privacy risks to customer information
Protect customer information from unauthorized access
Define retention periods and disposal schedules
Limit customer data use to authorized purposes
Limit collection of customer information
Ensure customer data used only for permitted purposes
Mask sensitive customer data when appropriate
Maintain inventory of customer information
Adopt policies for selecting service providers
Assess service provider security risks
Require service providers to maintain safeguards
Monitor service provider compliance with safeguards
Maintain inventory of service providers with customer data
Implement security awareness training program
Deliver periodic security training to staff
Train staff to recognize social engineering attacks
Operate security processes to detect events
Respond to and document security events
Manage vulnerabilities in systems and applications
Conduct periodic vulnerability scans
Remediate identified vulnerabilities promptly
Implement web application security controls
Secure web applications processing customer information
Implement input validation to prevent attacks
Support qualified individual with adequate resources
Integrate security and data minimization into projects
Identify threats to customer information
Incorporate threat intelligence into risk assessment
Assess threats and vulnerabilities to customer information
